OutputAugmentorDescription:
Attach to a machine to slightly 
increase it's produced quantity.
SpeedAugmentorDescription:
Attach to a machine to reduce the 
time it takes to finish processing.
EfficiencyAugmentorDescription:
Attach to a machine to reduce the 
input materials it requires.
QualityAugmentorDescription:
Attach to a machine to give it a chance 
to produce higher quality products.
ProductionAugmentorDescription:
Attach to a machine to significantly increase 
both it's required inputs and it's produced quantity.
DuplicationAugmentorDescription:
Attach to a machine to give it a slight 
chance to produce a copy of the machine 
when it processes a material.
DuplicationAugmentorEffectDescription: Chance for duplicate (per hour of processing)
